recipes.name: Air Fryer Chicken Tenders
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
In a small bowl, mix together the flour, salt, paprika, garlic powder, and black pepper.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg and milk.
Put the breadcrumbs in a third bowl.
Dredge each chicken tender in the flour mixture, then dip it in the egg mixture, and finally coat it in the breadcrumbs.
Place the chicken tenders in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Spray the chicken tenders with cooking spray.
Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the outside is crispy.
Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into thin fries.
In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato fries with the olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Place the sweet potato fries in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Cook for 12-15 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through, or until the fries are crispy and golden brown.
Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Salmon
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
Rub the salmon fillets with olive oil.
In a small bowl, mix together the garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Sprinkle the seasoning mixture over the salmon fillets.
Place the salmon fillets in the air fryer basket, skin side down.
Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes.

recipes.name: Air Fryer French Fries
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
Peel the potatoes and cut them into thin fries.
In a large bowl, toss the potato fries with the olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Place the potato fries in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Cook for 20 minutes, shaking the basket every 5 minutes, or until the fries are crispy and golden brown.
Serve hot with ketchup or your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Chicken Wings
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
In a small bowl, mix together the baking powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Pat the chicken wings dry with paper towels and place them in a large bowl.
Sprinkle the seasoning mixture over the chicken wings and toss to coat evenly.
Place the chicken wings in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Spray the chicken wings with cooking spray.
Cook for 20-25 minutes, shaking the basket every 5 minutes, or until the chicken wings are crispy and cooked through.
Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Shrimp
ingredients: 1 lb raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
In a large bowl, toss the shrimp with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.
Place the shrimp in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Air fry for 5 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through the cooking time.
Squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp and serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Pork Chops
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F.
Brush both sides of the pork chops with olive oil.
In a small bowl, mix together the garlic powder, dried thyme, salt, and black pepper.
Sprinkle the seasoning mixture over the pork chops.
Place the pork chops in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Air fry for 15 minutes, flipping the pork chops halfway through the cooking time.
Serve hot with your favorite sides, such as roasted vegetables or mashed potatoes.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Tofu
ingredients: Soy sauce or other dipping sauce, for serving
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F.
Press the tofu to remove excess water, then cut it into cubes.
In a large bowl, toss the tofu cubes with cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.
Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
Place the tofu cubes in the air fryer basket, making sure they don't touch each other.
Air fry for 15 minutes, shaking the basket every 5 minutes, or until the tofu is crispy and golden brown.
Serve hot with soy sauce or other dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Buffalo Cauliflower Wings
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, cut into bite-sized florets
Ranch or blue cheese dressing, for serving
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F.
In a large bowl, mix together the flour, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Add the almond milk to the bowl and whisk until smooth.
Add the cauliflower florets to the bowl and toss to coat evenly.
In a separate bowl, mix together the hot sauce and melted butter.
Remove each cauliflower floret from the almond milk mixture and dip it into the bread crumbs, pressing the crumbs onto the floret to make sure it is fully coated.
Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
Arrange the cauliflower florets in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
Air fry for 10 minutes, flipping the florets halfway through the cooking time.
Brush the hot sauce mixture onto each cauliflower floret and return them to the air fryer basket.
Air fry for an additional 5-7 minutes, until the florets are crispy and lightly browned.
Serve hot with ranch or blue cheese dressing.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Zucchini Chips
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F.
In a shallow bowl, mix together the flour, garlic powder, dried basil, salt, and black pepper.
In another shallow bowl, beat the eggs.
In a third shallow bowl, add the panko bread crumbs.
Dip each zucchini round into the flour mixture, then the eggs, and finally the bread crumbs, pressing the crumbs onto the zucchini to make sure it is fully coated.
Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
Arrange the zucchini rounds in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
Air fry for 5 minutes, then flip the rounds and air fry for an additional 5 minutes, until they are golden brown and crispy.
Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Meatballs
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, breadcrumbs, milk, egg, Parmesan cheese, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Roll the mixture into 1 1/2-inch meatballs.
Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
Arrange the meatballs in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
Air fry for 8 minutes, then flip the meatballs and air fry for an additional 7 minutes, until they are browned and cooked through.
Serve hot with marinara sauce.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Chicken Quesadillas
ingredients: Sour cream and additional salsa, for serving
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F.
In a large bowl, mix together the shredded chicken, salsa, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Lay out four tortillas on a work surface.
Divide the chicken mixture evenly among the tortillas, spreading it out in a single layer.
Sprinkle the cheese over the chicken mixture, dividing it evenly among the tortillas.
Top each tortilla with another tortilla to create a quesadilla.
Place the quesadillas in the air fryer basket.
Cook for 6-8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the tortillas are crispy.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Coconut Shrimp
ingredients: 1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: 1. Preheat air fryer to 400°F.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together flour, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder.
3. In another small bowl, beat eggs.
4. In a third small bowl, mix together shredded coconut and Panko breadcrumbs.
5. Dip shrimp into the flour mixture, then into the eggs, and then coat with the coconut and Panko breadcrumb mixture.
6. Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
7. Place shrimp in the air fryer basket and spray the tops of the shrimp with cooking spray.
8. Cook shrimp in the air fryer for 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the shrimp are golden brown and cooked through.
9. Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce and enjoy!

recipes.name: Air Fryer Chicken Parmesan
instructions: 1. Preheat air fryer to 400°F.
2. Pound chicken breasts to an even thickness with a meat mallet.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and black pepper.
4. In another small bowl, beat eggs.
5. In a third small bowl, mix together breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese.
6. Dip chicken breasts into the flour mixture, then into the eggs, and then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
7. Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray.
8. Place chicken breasts in the air fryer basket and spray the tops of the chicken breasts with cooking spray.
9. Cook chicken in the air fryer for 15-18 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the chicken is cooked through.
10. Top each chicken breast with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
11. Return chicken to air fryer and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Serve hot with a side of pasta or your favorite vegetables and enjoy!

recipes.name: Air Fryer Falafel
instructions: 1. Preheat air fryer to 375°F.
2. In a food processor, pulse together chickpeas, parsley, cilantro, onion, garlic, flour, cumin, coriander, salt, and black pepper until well combined.
3. Form mixture into 16 small balls.
4. Spray air fryer basket with cooking spray.
5. Place falafel balls in the air fryer basket and spray the tops of the balls with cooking spray.
6. Cook falafel in the air fryer for 12-15 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the falafel balls are golden brown and crispy.
7. Serve hot with tzatziki sauce or hummus and enjoy!
